OOC: Heh This has been green lighted by the council. Fun!

IC:

Above the island know as the "Alliance Island" a massive shadow falls 
over the dormant base as the infecticon warship "The Oblivon" now 
hovers overhead. Quickly within a barrage of firepower from its laser 
batteries, and hyper mega particle cannons, the ship blasts away two 
of the large laser turrets on the island as well as the manual 
artillary. Inside of the warship the mysterious Infecticons sits i a 
command chair as the rest of the Infecticons sit at their respective 
consoles overlooking various read outs.

Blight: "Any defenses that could have been used against us have been 
neutralized."

Frostbite: "The transporter has locked onto the energy signatures of 
the people of this island. The dormant ones are going to be 
transported to the stasis hold."

????: "Has there been anything that reads for why they initiated 
emergency stasis?"

Hooligan: "Negative, all scanner readouts are normal. There is 
however an unknown robot, scanners indicate he is not in what the 
cybertronians call stasis lock. He appears to be unconscious."

????: "Once we begin preparations for the 'purge' I want you to bring 
him aboard. We will see what we can do to get him up and about and to 
answer questions as to what went on here."

Hooligan nods before he turns back to his console.

????: "Demonite, Diablos, I want you to to head the salvaging. I want 
you to strip this base of anything that could be of use to anyone. As 
soon as this base is picked clean by us it will be wiped off the face 
of the planet."

The mysterious infecticon cackles as some white beams fly down from 
the infecticon ship to transport the "frozen" bodies of the alliance 
members...
